mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jobSeekerScrap (scrap_id, jobSeeker_id, jobPost_id, created) VALUES (jobSeekerScrap_seq.NEXTVAL, #{jobSeekerId}, #{jobPostId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT s.scrap_id AS scrapId, s.jobSeeker_id AS jobSeekerId, s.jobPost_id AS jobPostId, s.created AS created, j.title AS title, j.end_date AS endDate, j.salary AS salary, j.address AS address FROM jobSeekerScrap s JOIN jobPost j ON s.jobPost_id = j.jobPost_id WHERE s.jobSeeker_id = #{jobSeekerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
